== Add a User ==
''Add a user to the given role'' [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''method''': POST [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''path''': /roles/<role name>/add/ [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''permission''': super user only [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''success response''': 200 OK [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''failure response''': 400 Bad Request if required parameters are not found [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''return''': true or false if the user is already a member of the role [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''parameters''': 
 * '''username''' ''(required)'' <str> ''login of user to add to role''
[[BR]]

== Remove a User ==
''Remove a user from the given role'' [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''method''': POST [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''path''': /roles/<role name>/remove/ [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''permission''': super user only [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''success response''': 200 OK [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''failure response''': 
 400 Bad Request if required parameters are not found [[BR]]
                           400 Bad Request is the user is the last member of the super-users role [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''return''': true or false if the user is not a member of the role [[BR]]
[[BR]]
'''parameters''': 
 * '''username''' ''(required)'' <str> ''login of user to remove from role''
[[BR]]
